summary: Frontend updates for killers progression (13 total), boss presets (12 total), and admin pet quick-picks are visible in the diff. Backend changes for adding 9 new killers to unlockNextKiller() and adding 26 new dungeon quests cannot be verified from the provided truncated backend diff summary, so those requirements are treated as missing/unsupported by evidence. Additionally, unrequested documentation/state summary files were modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Extend the backend killer unlock progression in `backend/main.mo` to include 9 additional killer characters (Spydersammy, Doodle, Arkey, Caylus, Steak, Cruz, King arkey ðŸ‘‘, 67 kid, Zeus) unlockable via existing `unlockNextKiller()` flow after Noli, with unique incremental ids and non-empty fields (`description`, `url`, `stats`, `storyline`).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary for `backend/main.mo` is truncated and only shows type definitions and initialization; it does not include any evidence of updates to the killer roster data or the `unlockNextKiller()` progression logic/order/ids/error behavior.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add 26 new dungeon quests to the backend dungeon content in `backend/main.mo` (used by `useGetAllDungeonMaps`), each with unique id, non-empty English name/description, valid dungeonId, and rewardCurrency consistent with UI display.
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence is shown in the truncated `backend/main.mo` snippet of any new dungeon quest data being added or returned by the existing dungeon listing/query used by the frontend.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `frontend-file-summaries.txt` to describe broad functionality (e.g., new dungeon operations, clans page behavior, multiple page feature descriptions) beyond the specific requested UI tweaks for killers/bosses/admin pets.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for targeted changes in three frontend pages plus backend content additions; updating/adding this meta summary content is not requested.
The BuildRequest does not request changes to project metadata/state files; only content additions and specific UI/logic changes are requested.
